attributes.action: Replace ASBO's With Bad Lads Army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition for the Prime Minister to commision the TV series "Bad Lads Army" to replace ASBOs as an anti-social behavioural punishment. This could spell

A)the end for all things chav and repeat offenders 

b)the return of law & order to our streets!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
